channel.title: Black Partyhat?
channel.description: Hello i currently play runescape.servequake.com and I was talking to the owner and i ask him if he could make a black party hat and he try to figure it out and he cant so he said that if i can find out how he will for me. So can some tell me how to make a black partyhat? plox :D

item.title: Black Partyhat?
item.dc:creator: @doctoroo doctoroo
item.description:
@doctoroo wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:4, topic:167504”][quote author=fishnsmith link=topic=226920.msg1951248#msg1951248 date=1198528907]

A few clients have Black Partyhats, so maybe you could use those clients as the main one for the Server, or make your own.

do you know the names of them servers?
[/quote]The client’s have them, the server’s not.[/quote]

… yer like silab or dodain or my admin server lol

Read full topic
